DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine Contrast Enhanced Spectral Mammography ( CESM ) able detect smaller/earlier breast cancer well breast MRI .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Contrast Enhanced Mammography Breast MRI Screening Patients Increased Risk Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: Women consider increased risk develop breast carcinoma ( lifetime risk > 15 % due family history , genetic predisposition , prior radiation therapy chest , prior biopsy show high risk lesion , personal history breast cancer ) screen breast MRI . Women screen digital mammogram day CESM within 365 day prior Women 21 . Pregnant possibly pregnant . Women contraindication intravenous use iodinate contrast agent ( i.e. , allergy iodinated contrastor severely impaired renal function creatinine level > = 1.3 ) . Women breast implant . Women pacemaker . Women aneurysm clip n't allow MRI . Women claustrophobic undergo MRI .
